#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mp make_pair
#define PII pair<int,int>
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
 
const int NMAX=205;
const int KMAX=40;
 
int t,n,k;
PII a[NMAX];
long long sum[NMAX],c[NMAX][NMAX],dp[NMAX][KMAX];
 
int main()
{
    int i,j,l;
    long long aux;
 
    cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin>>t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        for (i=1;i<=n;i++) cin>>a[i].fi;
        for (i=1;i<=n;i++) cin>>a[i].se;
        sort(a+1,a+n+1);
        for (i=1;i<=n;i++) sum[i]=sum[i-1]+a[i].fi;
        for (i=0;i<=n;i++)
            {
                for (j=0;j<=n;j++)
                    c[i][j]=1<<30;
                for (j=0;j<=k;j++)
                    dp[i][j]=1<<30;
            }
        dp[0][0]=0;
        //prep
        for (i=1;i<=n;i++)
            for (j=i;j>=1;j--)
                for (l=i;l>=j;l--)//aleg orasul
                    {
                        aux=(l-j)*a[l].fi-(sum[l-1]-sum[j-1])+(sum[i]-sum[l])-(i-l)*a[l].fi+(i-j)*a[l].se;
                        c[i][j]=min(c[i][j],aux);
                    }
        for (i=1;i<=n;i++)
            for (j=1;j<=i && j<=k;j++)
                for (l=i;l>=1;l--)
                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],dp[l-1][j-1]+c[i][l]);
        cout<<dp[n][k]<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
